lines.text: butchers, bakers, writers; it just means you've got one foot on the brake.

[placing Lucy's hand against his heart]
I suddenly had the odd idea that your touch could heal me.
Is it the veins in my hands?

[regretting her fling with Sloan]
I'm trying to impose will and imagination on a sordid mistake.

[responding to Sloan's claim that he isn't gay]
If cannibals ate a lot of turnips, that wouldn't make them vegetarians.
